column7: Concepts and abstractions central to the development of modern computing systems, with an emphasis on the systems software that controls interaction between devices and other hardware and application programs. Input-output semantics; synchronization; interrupts; multitasking; virtualization of abstractions. Term-based projects. Credit is not given for both ECE 391 and CS 241. Prerequisite: ECE 220 or CS 233.
column9: Credit is not given for both ECE 391 and CS 241. Prerequisite: ECE 220 or CS 233.
